newsitem.title: USA: National City to restructure affiliates.
newsitem.headline: National City to restructure affiliates.

text.p: National City Bancshares Inc said Thursday its board of directors has approved steps to restructure its affiliates.
Under the steps, the National City Bank of Evansville and Farmers and Merchants Bank in Fort Branch, Indiana, will be merged.
Also, National City has agreed to acquire the Princeton, Indiana, banking center of its affiliate, United Federal Savings Bank.
United Federal will retain its Princeton retail loan portfolio, National City said.
National City also approved the merger of its State Bank of Washington and United Federal Savings Bank affiliates under State Bank's charter, the bank holding company said.
